name: Timothy and the Strange Holidays
description:
MADE FOR PIXEL GAME MAKER MV SUMMER JAM 2020

--

DISCLAIMER: this game was made in 12 days - bugs may occur! Be gentle! :)

Timothy and his friends (and enemies!) decided to take a break from their work for Kibou Entertainment. It's summer time, they deserve some rest! 

Join Timothy and his friends in this funny spin-off of the main series!

Challenges, exploration and lots of fun await you at Monster Island resort! And don't forget to bring some sun protection cream :)

  • A lot of different game mechanics: stealth, action, shooting, adventure!
  • Explore the island and talk with weird characters!
  • Collect coconuts and earn your ticket to go back home! Join the water polo championship, get ready for the watergun challenge or simply fly in the sky with your hang glider!
  • 2 hours of fun and a lot of references from the original game!
